title: GarageBand v1.2
description:
GarageBand turns your iPad, iPhone and iPod touch into a collection of Touch Instruments and a full-featured recording studio Ã¢â‚¬â€ so you can make music anywhere you go. Use Multi-Touch gestures to play pianos, organs, guitars, drums, and basses. They sound and play like their counterparts, but let you do things you could never do on a real instrument. Enjoy a full range of Smart Instruments that make you sound like a pro Ã¢â‚¬â€ even if youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ve never played a note before. Plug an electric guitar into your iPad, iPhone or iPod touch and play through classic amps and stompbox effects. Use the built-in microphone or a guitar to record, or capture any performance. Then mix up to eight tracks to create a song you can share. 

 Play your iPad, iPhone and iPod touch like a musical instrument
 Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Perform on dozens of musical instruments on the innovative Multi-Touch keyboard
 Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Tap out beats from the seat of acoustic and electronic drum kits
 Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Recreate legendary guitar rigs with 9 amps and 10 stompbox effects 
 Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Record your voice using the built-in microphone, and apply fun sound effects 
 Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Use the Sampler to create an instrument from sounds you record, then play them on a keyboard 

 Sound like a virtuoso with Smart Instruments
 Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Tap chords to instantly create keyboard grooves with the Smart Keyboard
 Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Strum chords on acoustic and electric Smart Guitars, or trigger fingerpicking patterns for popular chords 
 Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Groove with an onscreen electric or upright Smart Bass by tapping on chords
 Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Drag drum instruments onto a grid to create your own beats with the Smart Drums 

 Create a song anywhere you go
 Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Arrange and mix your song with up to eight tracks using Touch Instruments, audio recordings, and loops
 Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Trim and place musical regions exactly where you want them to play
 Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Use the Mixer to fine-tune each trackÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s volume Ã¢â‚¬â€œ solo or mute any track, or adjust pan, reverb, and echo 
 Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Use over 250 professionally prerecorded loops as a backing band to your song

 Share your songs
 Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Email songs right from GarageBand (AAC)
 Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Export your song and add it to the iTunes library on your Mac or PC 
 Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Send a project to your Mac and open it in GarageBand to continue refining your song 
What's new in Version 1.2
 Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Universal app designed for iPad, iPhone, and iPod touch
 Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Create custom chords for Smart Instruments
 Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Support for 3/4 and 6/8 time signatures
 Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Reset song key without transposing original recordings
 Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Transpose songs in semitones or full octaves
 Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Additional quantization options for recordings including, straight, triplet and swing
 Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ New audio export quality settings for AAC and AIFF (Uncompressed)
 Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Arpeggiator available in Smart Keyboard
 Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Adjustable velocity settings for Touch Instruments
 Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Numerous enhancements, including automatic fade out and improved audio import options
